title: Achievement
creator_credit: Lex Halliday, Jean Halliday, Crusader Cloth Pty Ltd and Australian Instructional Films
brief_description: The story of the Australian wool industry. The success of this industry and its importance to the Australian economy is dependent on the work of many people; the sheep breedere, the boundary rider, the wool classer, the broker, and the skilled operatives converting fibre to cloth, all play their part.
